t: TCG - Amazon's rights purchase and the winning storyline pitch
s: They have no control over brand new made-up-stuff appearing in those movies. The "War of the Rohirrim" movie, coming from a few brief mentions of such in the LOTR Appendices, falls under the SZ rights. The Estate cannot prevent that movie from being made.
